author: SuitFinancial2209
comment: fail even by 1 mark in pfp = gg on politemall under each subject there should be something showing the weightage of all the things you've done over the semester like term test, class part, etc just take a look at that, then add up all the percentages you've got so far and use that as a rough estimation of how many marks you need to score for the sem test
